byline.original: By ROCKY SINGH AND MAYUR SHARMA

abstract: Food lovers Rocky Singh and Mayur Sharma on the best way to enjoy Durga Puja in Kolkata.
snippet: Food lovers Rocky Singh and Mayur Sharma on the best way to enjoy Durga Puja in Kolkata.
lead_paragraph: Sleepy, slow Kolkata comes to life in the 10 days of Durga Puja, or simply Pujo, the festival celebrating the Hindu goddess Durga's slaying of the demon Mahishasur, which started this year on Sept. 27.

headline.main: Looking for the "Big Taste" of Bengal
